entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
